dialog.text: My family was slaughtered by the Lamanites because the judges were too weak to compel the people to gather sufficient defenses. I now know what I must do. Amlici was right. We need a king once again to rule this people. There is no other way for us to unite and stand strong against our enemies. I can be that king. Will you help me achieve this?
